basics.name: Nicolas Жбанков
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: I am a software developer with experience developing scalable applications in the node. J's, j2ee and c + +. I love coding in dynamic programming languages like javascript. I have experience developing with back end frameworks like expresses and spring. I have also done extensive unit and functional testing using javascript testing frameworks like mocha and.

references.reference: Nicolas is a unique it professional in that he is fluent both on the web / development side as well as the networking side! Nicolas achieved 8 different daily gamecock and comptia certifications while attending new horizons and passed over 20 + exams all on the first try! Most near perfect!! That is very rare. His ability to deliver ingenious solution to complex problems, in his best practices and coding. He will make a great asset to the team.
references.name: David Narciso

references.reference: I worked with Nicolas for several years and during that time always found Nicolas to be a creative, humble and dedicated colleague. He is keen to learn and keen to apply his knowledge in any environment, always rising to the challenge put before him. When asked to take on large scale projects – such as the production of a series of gameplay – Nicolas delivered without hesitation and with excellent execution, even if the projects were outside of his immediate role. I would highly recommend Nicolas for his positive character as a member of any creative team.
references.name: Maxime Dupierreux
